snippet.title: Marble World Official Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Create your own marble races, runs & machines! Decorate tracks & environments to your likings and fabricate unique experiences and share them with the world.

Marble World is now available for wishlisting:
Check it out at 👉 https://store.steampowered.com/app/1491340/Marble_World/

Marble World is a marble run, race & machine simulator with accurate physics where you can build the track of your dreams!


👉 Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1491340/Marble_World/
👉 Discord: https://discord.gg/jbx92tbMSG
👉 Twitter: https://twitter.com/MarbleWorldGame
👉 Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/marbleworld
👉 Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/marbleworldgame
